articles.title: Volcanoes acted as a safety valve for Earth's long-term climate - Phys.org
articles.description: Scientists at the University of Southampton have discovered that extensive chains of volcanoes have been responsible for both emitting and then removing atmospheric carbon dioxide (CO2) over geological time. This stabilized temperatures at Earth's surface.
